documentation.text: @dev Start a new round of Blackjack
@dev Taking no more cards and ended the game

returns.gameId: ID for the current Blackjack game
returns.gameMaxBet: Max bet allowed to be placed for new game
returns.round: Number of round of Blackjack game played
returns.startTime: Time the current Blackjack game began

returns.bet: Original bet at start of hand

newRound().details: Start a new round of Blackjack

stand().details: Taking no more cards and ended the game
